7585:
i was sailing along
minding my business
hiding from love
keeping my distance
i was too hurt for true love to find me
but like a pirate you snuck up behind me
and knocked me out with your love and affection
jsut one kiss changed my direction
...

(1409613209382)

I've got your number now
Gonna pull you under now
Hook, line and sinker
My sweet baby
No place for you to run
Before you can say Jack Robinson
I snapped my finger
And you'll be my baby
Don't try to fight it
There's nothing you can do
I'm so excited baby
Never, never thought I'd feel this way
I want to give you my everything
My everything

(1409613209382)

A love like ours don't need no explanation
Love makes the world go round
And it makes two people one
Without your love, my world would crumble my world would fall
When I'm in trouble
Who should I call

Looking out on the world, all I see
Shadows of the girl who meant so much to me
How I tried, to turn my back on that woman
Hey! Hey!

(Chorus)
Run back
I'm missing you baby
I'm sad
You really did hurt me
Run back
Make it up baby while we still got time

Every night I lie awake, I'm on the phone
Forget the fight, wrong or right, I want you home
In my dreams all I see is that woman
Hey! Hey!

(Chorus)
Run back
